definitions.text: having strength or power greater than average or expected

examples: a strong odor of burning rubber

definitions.text: having or wielding force or authority
examples: providing the ground soldier with increasingly potent weapons

definitions.text: having a strong physiological or chemical effect; ; ; ,
immune to attack; incapable of being tampered with
examples: fortifications that made the frontier inviolable

definitions.text: of good quality and condition; solidly built
of verbs not having standard (or regular) inflection
being distilled rather than fermented; having a high alcoholic content

examples: gave a strong pull on the rope
